feed.title: Scavengers' Repo
feed.subtitle: A collection of documentation for various tutorials and resources I've picked up along the way. Whether you're a fellow cybersec person or bewildered normie, this digital space can be a bit easier to navigate. Hopefully, maybe they'll help you too.

entry.title: Active Directory
entry.summary:
Forests, Trees, and Domains
[Screenshot of AD]
Active Directory’s Logical Divisions Domains: Group of network objects (ex.) with the same Active Directory database Tree: a group of domains stemming from those root domains. Forest: A whole bunch of these root domains
Setup DNS on Active Directory https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-TsqAHUWdQU&ab_channel=MSFTWebCast
